text: Wonkwang Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Wonkwang University, located in Iksan, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the smaller schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 60 students. == Programs== Wonkwang Law specializes on the small and medium business law. == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Law schools in South Korea
title: Wonkwang University Law School
